entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0167.10099] In the statement 001 - Statement - Condensed Balance Sheets the filer has defined multiple root calculation elements. It is expected that the calculation tree in this disclosure is a single tree and not multiple trees. The existence of multiple tree's indicate that there is a calculation missing. The root element LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity has sibling root elements of us-gaap:Assets, us-gaap:LiabilitiesCurrent in the filing. The sibling element us-gaap:LiabilitiesCurrent should appear as a calculation descendant of LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity. To fix the issue a parent calculation element should be defined for the element(s) us-gaap:LiabilitiesCurrent to create a single tree. The element us-gaap:LiabilitiesCurrent is defined as calculation descendant of LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity in the US GAAP taxonomy.
Rule Element Id:10099 Rule version: 23.0.7 -
